T02D2881:221a-0: @221a * // phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs kyi man ngag lag tu blang ba'i sgrub thabs bzhugs //
T02D2881:221a-1: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2881:221a-2: de yongs su bsnyen par 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin
T02D2881:221a-3: pas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar sa bslang ba
T02D2881:221a-7: mchod pa'i rdzas rnams ba sogs la sngon du 'gro ba'i las bya ste /
T02D2881:221a-9: de nas chos skyong dang rigs drug la sbyin /
T02D2881:221a-10: gtor ma rgya chen po btang /
T02D2881:221a-11: de nas bsam gtan khang ba byi dor byas te /
T02D2881:221a-12: me tog gcal du bkram la rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te /
T02D2881:221a-13: de'i dbus su mandal sngon po gru bzhi pa cig gi steng du /
T02D2881:221b-0: mchod @221b rten sngon po sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon po la sogs te /
T02D2881:221b-1: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2881:221b-3: bum pa bca' thabs rdzogs par byas la dang por khrus bya ste /
T02D2881:221b-4: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa nyid stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D2881:221b-5: dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la //
T02D2881:221b-6: de nas aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2881:221b-7: du h'um sngon po bsams te sngags 'di brjod par
T02D2881:221b-8: bya'o // aom sarba dharma t'a badzra siddhi h'um zhes
T02D2881:221b-9: pas snod bcu dang rdzas thams cad pa chen por
T02D2881:221b-10: bya'o // bsam mo // h'um de nyid las skad
T02D2881:221b-11: cig tu lha'i nga rgyal du gnas pa'i h'um las
T02D2881:221b-16: ae hye hi bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta buddha dharma sam gha badzra p'a ni /
T02D2881:221b-18: badzra sa ma ya h'um h'um dza: zhes brjod pas
T02D2881:221b-19: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa mdun du byon par
T02D2881:221b-20: bsam mo // padma k'a ma la ya stvam zhes gdan dbul lo //
T02D2881:221b-24: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2881:221b-25: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D2881:221b-26: gsol ba gdab cing skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2881:221b-27: lus dbul zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o //
T02D2881:221b-28: de nas yi ge brgya pas tshogs sogs lha rnams gshegs su gsol /
T02D2881:221b-29: aom a'a:bighananta krita h'um zhes pas bdag nyid bgegs dgra'i
T02D2881:221b-30: ting nge 'dzin gyis yungs kar la sngags bzlas te
T02D2881:221b-31: / khro bo'i sprul par spro ste /
T02D2881:221b-32: aom aa mri ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um /
T02D2881:221b-33: sarba bighn'anta krita h'um phat ces phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad
T02D2881:221b-34: steng 'og bcur sngags bdun bdun dang bcas te mtshams
T02D2881:221b-35: gcad par bya'o // na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2881:221b-36: na ma:tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2881:221b-37: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2881:221b-38: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02D2881:221b-39: ma h'a dam shtrotka ta bhree ra b'a ya /
T02D2881:221b-40: aa si mu sa la dha r'a ya /
T02D2881:221b-41: pa ra shu p'a sha ha st'a ya /
T02D2881:221b-43: aom aa mri ta kunda li kha kha /
T02D2881:221b-50: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02D2881:221b-51: sarba bighn'am bi n'a ya k'am /
T02D2881:221b-52: ma h'a ga na pa ti /
T02D2881:221b-53: dz'i bi t'anta ka r'a ya sv'a h'a zhes mtshon cha'i char phab la btul zhing sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D2881:222a-1: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang dbral bar bya'o snyam pa ni snying rje tshad med pa'o //
T02D2881:222a-2: bde ba la dgod par bya'o snyam pa ni byams pa tshad med pa'o //
T02D2881:222a-3: bde ba dang nam du'ang mi 'bral bar bya'o snyam pa ni dga' ba tshad med pa'o //
T02D2881:222a-4: de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa ni btang snyoms tshad med pa'o //
T02D2881:222a-5: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
T02D2881:222a-6: zhes pa stong pa nyid du bsams la /
T02D2881:222a-7: de'i dang las ae las chos 'byung gru gsum pa'i dbus su yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2881:222a-9: kham las gser gyi sa gzhi //
T02D2881:222a-10: ram las me ri lnga'i dbus su /
T02D2881:222a-11: lam las ri rab kyi steng du /
T02D2881:222a-12: sam yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D2881:222a-13: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i gur dang /
T02D2881:222a-14: rab dang mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bsgoms pa'i dbus su /
T02D2881:222a-15: bhr'am sngon po 'phro 'dus pa las gzhal yas khang sngon po gru bzhi sgo bzhi /
T02D2881:222a-16: sgo khyud dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2881:222a-17: tsa ser po las 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs bzhi'i dbus su pam las padma /
T02D2881:222a-19: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um mthing nag bsams te /
T02D2881:222a-21: sems can gyi don byas nas snang ba thams cad rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur te /
T02D2881:222a-22: de dag yongs su gyur pa las khro bo'i rdo
T02D2881:222a-23: rje rtse lnga pa kha dog sngon po 'od zer
T02D2881:222a-24: gyi phreng ba rnam par 'khrugs pa lte ba h'um
T02D2881:222a-26: de'i 'od zer gyis khro bo'i rigs rnams bkug nas de dag yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2881:222a-27: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo
T02D2881:222a-28: rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung
T02D2881:222a-29: phrag 'bum bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba
T02D2881:222a-30: / mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa'am /
T02D2881:222a-31: sku mdog sngon po g-yas rdo rje /
T02D2881:222a-32: g-yon sdigs mdzub klu chen po brgyad kyis gzungs nas 'byung ba ltar brgyan pa /
T02D2881:222a-34: na bza' chos gos sngon po dang ;
T02D2881:222a-37: nyi ma dang padma'i steng na klu chen po brgyad
T02D2881:222a-38: nam mkha'i lding gi rgyal po dang bcas par yang
T02D2881:222a-40: de nyid kyi snying gar ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo gos sngon po can rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2881:222b-0: dbang po drug la'ang de @222b dang 'dra ba'i gos sngon po can re bsam par bya'o //
T02D2881:222b-1: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i h'um las h'um
T02D2881:222b-2: re 'khor lo'i steng du gnas pa las phyag mtshan
T02D2881:222b-3: tri sh'ul dang / ral gri dang /
T02D2881:222b-5: 'khor lo h'um gis mtshan par gyur te /
T02D2881:222b-6: de dag yongs su gyur pa las shar gyi 'khor
T02D2881:222b-7: lo'i steng du las kyi gnod sbyin lag na rdo
T02D2881:222b-9: g-yon tri sh'ul rtse gsum 'phan can 'phyar ba /
T02D2881:222b-10: na bza' mi bzad sngo bkra gsol ba /
T02D2881:222b-11: gdan klu rgyal rigs mnan pa'o //
T02D2881:222b-12: lhor rdo rje srin po g-yas rdo rje g-yon ral gri /
T02D2881:222b-13: na bza' padma r'a ga / gdan bram ze'i rigs can mnan pa'o //
T02D2881:222b-14: nub tu rdo rje gdon chen g-yas rdo rje g-yon dbyug to //
T02D2881:222b-16: na bza' za hor btso dmar gsol ba'o //
T02D2881:222b-17: byang gi 'khor lo'i steng du rdo rje ro langs g-yas rdo rje /
T02D2881:222b-19: na bza' ba ti khra bo gdan klu dmangs rigs mnan pa'o //
T02D2881:222b-20: sde dpon de dag kyang sku mdog gtso po dang mthun pa /
T02D2881:222b-21: klu rnams kyis rgyan mdzad pa /
T02D2881:222b-22: bskal pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na bsgom mo //
T02D2881:222b-23: dza:h'um bam ho:bzhi las sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma dang /
T02D2881:222b-27: khro mo de dag kyang stag gi sham thabs dang /
T02D2881:222b-29: nyi zla'i gdan dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2881:222b-30: de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas gnas lngar gtugs te /
T02D2881:222b-31: na ma:sa manta badzra n'am ka ba tsa h'um zhes
T02D2881:222b-32: brjod pas lus thams cad rdo rjer bar bsgom mo
T02D2881:222b-33: // de nas rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02D2881:222b-34: na ma:sa manta badzra n'am badzra tsanda ma h'a ro
T02D2881:222b-35: sha na h'um zhes brjod nas gnas lngar rgyas btab
T02D2881:222b-36: pas lus thams cad rdo rje'i dra mig rnams khro
T02D2881:222b-37: chung tshon gang pas btams par bsams te byin gyis
T02D2881:222b-38: brlab po // de nas de ltar dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02D2881:222b-39: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa ni /
T02D2881:222b-40: 'og min gnas mchog ngam pa yi //
T02D2881:222b-41: lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas //
T02D2881:222b-42: sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes gnang ba'i //
T02D2881:222b-43: gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can //
T02D2881:222b-46: padma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2881:222b-47: phyag na rdo rje dbang gi mthu //
T02D2881:223a-2: ri rab chen po'i lcog bzhi yi //
T02D2881:223a-3: lcags ri nag po'i gzhal yas nas //
T02D2881:223a-4: spyan 'dren mchod kyis gshegs su gsol //
T02D2881:223a-5: yaksha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra b'a ni h'um /
T02D2881:223a-6: ma h'a yaksha sen pa ta ye /
T02D2881:223a-11: sa ma aa manda lam dhye /
T02D2881:223a-12: a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya /
T02D2881:223a-13: pra be sha ya pra we sha ya /
T02D2881:223a-16: aa ba lo k'a ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2881:223a-18: gdug pa 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni //
T02D2881:223a-19: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can //
T02D2881:223a-20: mchod rten sngon po'i gzhal yas 'dir //
T02D2881:223a-21: dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2881:223a-22: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis //
T02D2881:223a-23: las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2881:223a-24: gnod sbyin sde dpon 'khor dang bcas //
T02D2881:223a-25: phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil nas kyang /
T02D2881:223a-26: 'tsham pa'i gdan la gzhugs su gsol //
T02D2881:223a-27: yaksha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um ma h'a yaksha se na pa ta ye /
T02D2881:223a-28: badzra sa ma ya tishtha lhan /
T02D2881:223a-29: sangs rgyas mang pos dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2881:223a-30: gnod sbyin kun pas khyad par 'phags //
T02D2881:223a-31: mthu stobs kun gyi bdag po ste //
T02D2881:223a-32: stobs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2881:223a-33: las kyi gnod sbyin chen po rnams //
T02D2881:223a-34: 'jigs su rung ba'i cha lugs can //
T02D2881:223a-35: thams cad ma lus 'jigs par byed //
T02D2881:223a-36: rigs bzhi klu yi gnyen po ste //
T02D2881:223a-38: de nas mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
T02D2881:223a-39: shel ltar dag pa'i snod mchog tu //
T02D2881:223a-40: bkra shis 'o ma'i chab kyis gtams //
T02D2881:223a-41: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi//
T02D2881:223a-43: yaksha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um /
T02D2881:223a-44: ma h'a yaksha se na pa ta ye /
T02D2881:223a-45: badzra pa ni tsanda ma h'a yaksha kro dha /
T02D2881:223a-52: a'a ha ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2881:223a-53: me tog dam pa 'di dag dang //
T02D2881:223a-54: de bzhin lha rdzas me tog rnams //
T02D2881:223a-55: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2881:223a-57: badzra pushpe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'aha'/
T02D2881:223a-58: aa ka ru dang tu rushda //
T02D2881:223a-59: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i dri //
T02D2881:223b-0: lha @223b rdzas dam pa'i bdug spos 'di //
T02D2881:223b-1: gsang bdag 'phags pa gos sngon gyi //
T02D2881:223b-3: badzra dh'u pe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra nas ma ye sv'a h'am /
T02D2881:223b-4: tsandan ga pur dz'a ti dang //
T02D2881:223b-5: gur gum chu gtsang sman sbyar 'di //
T02D2881:223b-6: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2881:223b-8: badzra gandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2881:223b-9: mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed cing //
T02D2881:223b-10: phyogs bcu gsal ba'i mar me 'di //
T02D2881:223b-11: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2881:223b-13: badzra a'a lo ke d'i pam p'u dza me gha
T02D2881:223b-14: sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye sv'ah'a
T02D2881:223b-15: / kha dog dri dang ro ldan pa'i //
T02D2881:223b-16: lha rdzas dam pa'i zhal zas 'di //
T02D2881:223b-17: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2881:223b-19: badzra nee bidye p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2881:223b-20: bla med rdo rje theg pa'i don ston pa'i //
T02D2881:223b-21: shes rab mchog gi rjes 'gro rol mo'i sgra //
T02D2881:223b-22: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2881:223b-24: bdud kyi 'khor lo gzhom phyir bzhes su gsol //
T02D2881:223b-25: badzra g'i ti ga ta ga ta h'um /
T02D2881:223b-26: spha ra na sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2881:223b-27: bla re rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs //
T02D2881:223b-28: dpung rgyan do shal se mo do //
T02D2881:223b-29: na bza' chos gos sngon por bcas //
T02D2881:223b-31: aom wastra aa lam ka ra bi bh'u sha na
T02D2881:223b-32: p'u dza spha ra na sa ma ya h'um sv'a
T02D2881:223b-33: h'a / de nas bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la //
T02D2881:223b-34: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis //
T02D2881:223b-35: las kyi khro bar dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2881:223b-36: sku gsung thugs dang phrin las las //
T02D2881:223b-37: gnod sbyin sde dpon bzhi sprul pa //
T02D2881:223b-38: ri rab chen po'i lcog la gnas //
T02D2881:223b-39: kun kyang sku mdog mthing nag la //
T02D2881:223b-40: g-yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams //
T02D2881:223b-41: g-yon pa so so'i phyag mtshan 'dzin //
T02D2881:223b-42: na bza' la ba sngon po gsol //
T02D2881:223b-43: mi bzang sdo bkra stag sham /
T02D2881:223b-45: klu chen brgyad kyis sku la brgyan //
T02D2881:223b-46: dus mtha'i me dpung 'bar ba yi //
T02D2881:223b-48: klu rigs bzhi la 'bebs mdzad pa //
T02D2881:223b-49: sde dpon rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2881:223b-50: de nas yan lag bdun pas sdig pa bshags la /
T02D2881:224a-0: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab @224a * //
T02D2881:224a-2: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams bstim par bya'o //
T02D2881:224a-3: aom a'a:h'um zhes spyi bo dang /
T02D2881:224a-4: mgrin pa dang snying gar dkar po dmar po dang /
T02D2881:224a-6: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la yi ge bcu gsum pa bkod de /
T02D2881:224a-8: de nyid las spro bsdu'i rim pa ni /
T02D2881:224a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'ak tsitta
T02D2881:224a-10: badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham zhes phyogs bcu'i 'jig
T02D2881:224a-11: rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams bye
T02D2881:224a-12: ba phrag brjod kyis mi lang bar 'dod yon gyi
T02D2881:224a-13: lha mo rnams kyis 'phags pa rnams la yang dag
T02D2881:224a-14: par mchod cing gnyis su med par thim nas de
T02D2881:224a-15: dag gi gsung rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2881:224a-16: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnams kyi 'od
T02D2881:224a-17: zer bdag nyid la thim pas sgrib pa sbyangs te
T02D2881:224a-18: / thugs ka'i 'od zer 'gro drug la phog pas rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur nas /
T02D2881:224a-19: sems can gyi don byas te /
T02D2881:224a-20: slar bdag nyid la bstim pa dang /
T02D2881:224a-21: spro bsdu'i rim pa yang nas yang du bya'o //
T02D2881:224a-22: de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2881:224a-23: rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2881:224a-24: sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
T02D2881:224a-25: de'i sras khro bo rnams spyan drangs pa dang /
T02D2881:224a-26: mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa /
T02D2881:224a-27: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D2881:224a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i gzungs las ji ltar
T02D2881:224a-29: 'byung ba ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs mi
T02D2881:224a-30: bskyod pa / rigs bzhi'i 'khor dang sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
T02D2881:224a-31: rigs kyi yum rnams kyis bum pas dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2881:224a-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags yi ge brgya pas sku khrus gsol ba ni /
T02D2881:224a-33: lha'i rjes su gnang ba ste /
T02D2881:224a-34: sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2881:224a-35: mdo nas ji ltar 'byung ba ltar sngags kyi gnang
T02D2881:224a-36: ba thob pa ni gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlab
T02D2881:224a-37: pa'o // aom shr'i badzra p'a ni h'um /
T02D2881:224a-38: ma h'a tsanda sarba dusht'a na sarba buddha sa pa
T02D2881:224a-39: ri w'a ra badzra sam ya dza:h'um bam ho: zhes
T02D2881:224a-40: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D2881:224a-43: tha mi dad par byas te /
T02D2881:224a-44: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid khams gsum /
T02D2881:224a-45: chos kyi rgyal po thugs gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par gyur te /
T02D2881:224a-46: ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2881:224b-0: skyo bar gyur na @224b bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D2881:224b-1: pa'i gzungs kyi phreng ba kho na la sprul 'khril
T02D2881:224b-2: ba ltar bzlas shing rdo rje gsum gyi dgongs pas
T02D2881:224b-3: bdag nyid kyi lus kyi nad dang /
T02D2881:224b-5: klu'i dug dang gdug rtsub rnams zhi bar bsgom mo //
T02D2881:224b-6: thun mtshams su bzlas pa gtong bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D2881:224b-7: ye shes sems dpa' mchod rten sngon por bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D2881:224b-8: me tog la sogs pas kyang mchod cing bstod la gtor ma btang ba'i las bya'o //
T02D2881:224b-10: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02D2881:224b-12: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2881:224b-17: spyod lam gyi dus su skad cig mas lhar bskyed //
T02D2881:224b-19: go bgo / nang ye shes kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2881:224b-20: phyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo gsal gdab /
T02D2881:224b-22: rtag tu lha'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2881:224b-23: sgyu ma lta bu'i blos dge ba'i las 'ba' zhig la 'bad par bya'o //
T02D2881:224b-24: bsnyen pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
T02D2881:224b-25: rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge 'bru bcu bdun pa dang
T02D2881:224b-26: / las kyi phyag na rdo rje'i yi ge bcu
T02D2881:224b-27: pa la rtag tu bzlas shing nang nub bum pa
T02D2881:224b-28: la gzungs sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bsnyen pa dbul
T02D2881:224b-29: / lo // gta' gtor la'ang de bzhin bya'o //
T02D2881:224b-30: bsnyen pa'i grangs kyi tshad ni bye ba'am bdun 'bum mo //
T02D2881:224b-31: rtags kyi mtshan ma thob nas bsnyen pa thon nas /
T02D2881:224b-32: nam gung la gta' gtor btang /
T02D2881:224b-33: tho rangs bum pas rang ngam slob ma la dbang bskur /
T02D2881:224b-34: gta' bdag las kyi gnod sbyin ri rab kyi lcog la gshegs su gsol /
T02D2881:224b-35: bum pa'i lhas bdag la rgyas gdab /
T02D2881:224b-37: dngos grub kyi rten phud lha la dbul /
T02D2881:224b-38: lhag ma dngos grub tu dmigs la rang za /
T02D2881:224b-41: lha rgyun du 'khor ba'i man ngag la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2881:224b-42: dpal phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs kyi man ngag
T02D2881:224b-43: lag tu blang ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po
